comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: The soldiers are marching along George Street, Sydney. Martin Place is at bottom left. The General Post Office (G.P.O.) is the building at front left. Comparison view of the GPO is here: www.flickr.com/photos/lifeasdaddy/2678110067/in/photostream
